channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-23151] LLAP: default hive.llap.file.cleanup.delay.seconds=0s
item.description: The current default value (300s) reflects more a debugging scenario, let's set this to 0s in order to make shuffle local files be cleaned up immediately after dag complete.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
